velocities.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              VELOCITIES
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision: 518 $
00006 !
00007 !   Calculate velocities from accelerations
00008 ! 
00009 !   apply thermodynamic constraint according to ensemble
00010 !
00011 !
00012 !
00013 !  ===================================================================
00014 
00015 
00016 subroutine velocities(p_start,p_finish,delta_t)
00017 
00018 
00019   use physvars
00020   use treevars
00021   use utils
00022   implicit none
00023   include 'mpif.h'
00024 
00025   real, intent(in) :: delta_t
00026   integer, intent(in) :: p_start,p_finish  ! min, max particle nos.
00027 
00028   integer p, i, ne_loc, ierr
00029   real*8, dimension(nppm) :: uhx, uhy, uhz, accx, accy, accz
00030   real*8 :: sum_vxe, sum_vye, sum_vze, sum_v2e, sum_2ve, acmax
00031   real :: Te0, Te_uncor, Ti0, Ti_uncor, chie, chii, delta_u
00032   real*8 :: sum_vxi, sum_vyi, sum_vzi, sum_v2i, sum_2vi, mass_eqm
00033   real*8 :: global_v2e, global_v2i, gammah, delta_Te, delta_Ti, Te_local
00034 
00035 !  Available ensemble modes
00036 !      1 = NVE - total energy conserved
00037 !      2 = NVT - global Te, Ti conserved
00038 !      3 = global NVT electron Te conserved; ions frozen
00039 !      4 = local NVT: each PE keeps Te clamped; ions frozen
00040 !      5 = local NVT, ions only; electrons added at end of run
00041 
00042 ! Accelerations
00043   acmax=0.
00044   do i=1,npp
00045      accx(i) = q(i)*ex(i)/m(i)
00046      accy(i) = q(i)*ey(i)/m(i)
00047      accz(i) = q(i)*ez(i)/m(i)
00048      acmax = max(abs(accx(i)),abs(accy(i)),abs(accz(i)),acmax)
00049   end do
00050 
00051   delta_u = acmax*delta_t
00052 
00053   if (scheme == 2) then
00054      ! Conserve kinetic energies of electrons and ions (initial Te const)
00055      ! adapted from
00056      !  Allen and Tildesley p230, Brown & Clark, Mol. Phys. 51, 1243 (1984)
00057 
00058      !  Definitions:
00059      !
00060      !   unconstrained velocities    uh(x,y,z) = v'(x,y,z)
00061 
00062      !  1)  Unconstrained half-step for electrons
00063 
00064      sum_vxe=0.0  ! partial sums
00065      sum_vye=0.0
00066      sum_vze=0.0
00067      sum_v2e=0.0
00068      sum_vxi=0.0  ! partial sums (ions)
00069      sum_vyi=0.0
00070      sum_vzi=0.0
00071      sum_v2i=0.0
00072 
00073      do p=1,npp
00074            uhx(p) = ux(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accx(p)
00075            uhy(p) = uy(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accy(p)
00076            uhz(p) = uz(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accz(p)
00077            gammah = sqrt(1.0 +uhx(p)**2 + uhy(p)**2 + uhz(p)**2) 
00078         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00079            ! electrons
00080            sum_vxe  = sum_vxe  + uhx(p)/gammah
00081            sum_vye  = sum_vye  + uhy(p)/gammah
00082            sum_vze  = sum_vze  + uhz(p)/gammah
00083            sum_v2e = sum_v2e + gammah-1.
00084 
00085         else if (pelabel(p)<=ne+ni) then
00086            ! ions
00087            sum_vxi  = sum_vxi  + uhx(p)/gammah
00088            sum_vyi  = sum_vyi  + uhy(p)/gammah
00089            sum_vzi  = sum_vzi  + uhz(p)/gammah
00090            sum_v2i = sum_v2i + gammah-1.
00091         endif
00092      end do
00093      sum_2ve = sum_vxe**2 + sum_vye**2 + sum_vze**2
00094      sum_2vi = sum_vxi**2 + sum_vyi**2 + sum_vzi**2
00095 
00096      ! Find global KE sums
00097      call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_v2e, global_v2e, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00098      call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_v2i, global_v2i, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00099 
00100 
00101     ! Te_uncor = 0.5*(global_v2/ne - global_2v/ne**2)      !  uncorrected temperature
00102      Te_uncor = 511*2./3.*global_v2e/ne  ! This should equal 3/2 kT for 3v Maxwellian
00103      Te0 = Te_keV  ! normalised electron temp
00104 
00105      Ti_uncor = 511*mass_i/mass_e*2./3.*global_v2i/ni  ! This should equal 3/2 kT for 3v Maxwellian
00106      Ti0 = Ti_keV  ! normalised electron temp
00107 
00108 
00109      chie = sqrt(abs(Te0/Te_uncor))     ! multipliers from Temperature ratio - reset once every cycle
00110      chii = sqrt(abs(Ti0/Ti_uncor)) 
00111 
00112      if (me==0) write (*,*) 'Te_unc ',Te_uncor,' Te0 ', Te0, ' chie ',chie
00113      if (me==0) write (*,*) 'Ti_unc ',Ti_uncor,' Ti0 ', Ti0, ' chii ',chii
00114 
00115      !  3)  Complete full step
00116 
00117      do p=1,npp
00118         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00119            ux(p) = (2*chie-1.)*ux(p) + chie*delta_t*accx(p)
00120            uy(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uy(p) + chie*delta_t*accy(p)
00121            if (idim==3) uz(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uz(p) + chie*delta_t*accz(p)
00122 
00123         elseif (pelabel(p)<=ne+ ni) then
00124            ux(p) = (2*chii-1.)*ux(p) + chii*delta_t*accx(p)
00125            uy(p) = (2*chii-1.)*uy(p) + chii*delta_t*accy(p)
00126            if (idim==3) uz(p) = (2*chii-1.)*uz(p) + chii*delta_t*accz(p)
00127         endif
00128      end do
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133      delta_Ti=0.
00134 
00135 
00136      delta_Te = 2*Te0*(1.0/chie**2-1.0)       !  heating
00137      !     heate = heate + delta_Te
00138 
00139 
00140   else if (scheme ==3) then
00141 
00142 ! electrons clamped, ions frozen
00143 
00144      sum_vxe=0.0  ! partial sums
00145      sum_vye=0.0
00146      sum_vze=0.0
00147      sum_v2e=0.0
00148      ne_loc = 0  ! # local electrons
00149 
00150      do p=1,npp
00151 
00152         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00153            ! electrons
00154            ne_loc = ne_loc + 1
00155            uhx(p) = ux(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accx(p)
00156            uhy(p) = uy(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accy(p)
00157            uhz(p) = uz(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accz(p)
00158            gammah = sqrt(1.0 +uhx(p)**2 + uhy(p)**2 + uhz(p)**2) 
00159            sum_vxe  = sum_vxe  + uhx(p)/gammah
00160            sum_vye  = sum_vye  + uhy(p)/gammah
00161            sum_vze  = sum_vze  + uhz(p)/gammah
00162            sum_v2e = sum_v2e + gammah-1.
00163 
00164         endif
00165      end do
00166      sum_2ve = sum_vxe**2 + sum_vye**2 + sum_vze**2
00167 
00168      ! Find global KE sums
00169      call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_v2e, global_v2e, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00170 
00171 
00172     ! Te_uncor = 0.5*(global_v2/ne - global_2v/ne**2)      !  uncorrected temperature
00173      Te_uncor = 511*2./3.*global_v2e/ne  ! This should equal 3/2 kT for 3v Maxwellian
00174      Te_local = 511*2./3.*sum_v2e/ne_loc
00175      Te0 = Te_keV  ! normalised electron temp
00176      chie = sqrt(abs(Te0/Te_uncor))     ! multipliers from Temperature ratio - reset once every cycle
00177      chie = min(1.25,max(chie,0.75))  ! Set bounds of +- 50%
00178 
00179      if (me==0) write (*,*) 'Te_unc ',Te_uncor,' Te0 ', Te0, ' chie ',chie
00180 
00181      !  3)  Complete full step
00182 
00183      do p=1,npp
00184         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00185            ux(p) = (2*chie-1.)*ux(p) + chie*delta_t*accx(p)
00186            uy(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uy(p) + chie*delta_t*accy(p)
00187            if (idim==3) uz(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uz(p) + chie*delta_t*accz(p)
00188         endif
00189      end do
00190 
00191      delta_Ti=0.
00192      delta_Te = 2*Te0*(1.0/chie**2-1.0)       !  heating
00193 
00194   else if (scheme ==4) then
00195 
00196 
00197 ! electrons clamped locally, ions frozen
00198 ! - require T=T_e on each PE to avoid local drifts
00199 
00200      sum_vxe=0.0  ! partial sums
00201      sum_vye=0.0
00202      sum_vze=0.0
00203      sum_v2e=0.0
00204      ne_loc = 0  ! # local electrons
00205 
00206      do p=1,npp
00207 
00208         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00209            ! electrons
00210            ne_loc = ne_loc+1  
00211            uhx(p) = ux(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accx(p)
00212            uhy(p) = uy(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accy(p)
00213            uhz(p) = uz(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accz(p)
00214            gammah = sqrt(1.0 +uhx(p)**2 + uhy(p)**2 + uhz(p)**2) 
00215            sum_vxe  = sum_vxe  + uhx(p)/gammah
00216            sum_vye  = sum_vye  + uhy(p)/gammah
00217            sum_vze  = sum_vze  + uhz(p)/gammah
00218            sum_v2e = sum_v2e + gammah-1.
00219 
00220         endif
00221      end do
00222      sum_2ve = sum_vxe**2 + sum_vye**2 + sum_vze**2
00223 
00224      ! Find local KE temp
00225 
00226     ! Te_uncor = 0.5*(global_v2/ne - global_2v/ne**2)      !  uncorrected temperature
00227      Te_uncor = 511*2./3.*sum_v2e/ne_loc  ! This should equal 3/2 kT for 3v Maxwellian
00228      Te0 = Te_keV  ! normalised electron temp
00229      ! exponent of chie should be 1/2 - take 1/3 to soften oscillations
00230      chie = (abs(Te0/Te_uncor))**0.5     ! multipliers from Temperature ratio - reset once every cycle
00231 
00232      chie = min(1.25,max(chie,0.75))  ! Set bounds of +- 50%
00233 
00234      if (me.eq.0) write (*,*) 'Te_unc ',Te_uncor,' Te0 ', Te0, ' chie ',chie
00235 
00236      !  3)  Complete full step
00237 
00238      do p=1,npp
00239         if (pelabel(p)<=ne) then
00240            ux(p) = (2*chie-1.)*ux(p) + chie*delta_t*accx(p)
00241            uy(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uy(p) + chie*delta_t*accy(p)
00242            if (idim==3) uz(p) = (2*chie-1.)*uz(p) + chie*delta_t*accz(p)
00243         endif
00244      end do
00245 
00246      delta_Ti=0.
00247      delta_Te = 2*Te0*(1.0/chie**2-1.0)       !  heating
00248 
00249 
00250   else if (scheme == 5) then
00251      ! Conserve kinetic energy of ions only (initial Ti const)
00252      mass_eqm = 20.  ! artificial ion mass for eqm stage
00253      sum_vxi=0.0  ! partial sums (ions)
00254      sum_vyi=0.0
00255      sum_vzi=0.0
00256      sum_v2i=0.0
00257 !  Scale down accelerations if too big
00258      do p=1,npp
00259         accx(p)=accx(p)/max(1.d0,acmax)
00260         accy(p)=accy(p)/max(1.d0,acmax)
00261         accz(p)=accz(p)/max(1.d0,acmax)
00262      end do
00263 
00264      do p=1,npp
00265            uhx(p) = ux(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accx(p)
00266            uhy(p) = uy(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accy(p)
00267            uhz(p) = uz(p) + 0.5*delta_t*accz(p)
00268 
00269         if (pelabel(p)>=ne) then
00270            ! ions
00271            sum_vxi  = sum_vxi  + uhx(p)
00272            sum_vyi  = sum_vyi  + uhy(p)
00273            sum_vzi  = sum_vzi  + uhz(p)
00274            sum_v2i = sum_v2i + 0.5*(uhx(p)**2+uhy(p)**2+uhz(p)**2)
00275         endif
00276      end do
00277      sum_2vi = sum_vxi**2 + sum_vyi**2 + sum_vzi**2
00278 
00279      ! Find global KE sums
00280 !     call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_v2i, global_v2i, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00281      Ti_uncor = 511*2./3.*sum_v2i/npp  ! This should equal 3/2 kT for 3v Maxwellian
00282      Ti0 = Ti_keV  ! normalised electron temp
00283 
00284 
00285      chii = sqrt(abs(Ti0/Ti_uncor)) 
00286      chii = min(1.2,max(chii,0.6))  ! Set bounds of +- 50%
00287 
00288 
00289      !  3)  Complete full step
00290 
00291      do p=1,npp
00292 
00293         if (pelabel(p)>=ne) then
00294        ! make ions lighter for eqm phase
00295            ux(p) = (2*chii-1.)*ux(p) + chii*delta_t*accx(p)
00296            uy(p) = (2*chii-1.)*uy(p) + chii*delta_t*accy(p)
00297            if (idim==3) uz(p) = (2*chii-1.)*uz(p) + chii*delta_t*accz(p)
00298 !           ux(p) = ux(p)*sqrt(Ti0/Ti_uncor)
00299 !           uy(p) = uy(p)*sqrt(Ti0/Ti_uncor)
00300 !           uz(p) = uz(p)*sqrt(Ti0/Ti_uncor)
00301 
00302         endif
00303      end do
00304      delta_Ti = 2*Ti0*(1.0/chii**2-1.0)       !  heating
00305      if (me==0) then
00306         write (*,*) 'Ti_unc ',Ti_uncor,' Ti0 ', Ti0, ' chii ',chii,' heating:',delta_Ti,' bond',bond_const
00307         write (*,*) 'Max delta-ux: ',delta_u
00308      endif
00309 
00310 
00311   else
00312 
00313      ! unconstrained motion by default (scheme=1)
00314 
00315      do p = p_start, p_finish
00316         ux(p) = ux(p) + delta_t * accx(p)
00317         uy(p) = uy(p) + delta_t * accy(p)
00318         if (idim==3) uz(p) = uz(p) + delta_t * accz(p)
00319      end do
00320 
00321   endif
00322 
00323 end subroutine velocities
